sentence.Network_en: An outsider might misconstrue the nature of the relationship.
sentence.Network_cn: 外人也许会误解这种关系的本质。

sentence.Network_en: It is easy to misconstrue confidence as arrogance.
sentence.Network_cn: 很容易将信心误解为傲慢。

sentence.Network_en: Do not misconstrue it as an effort to exert force or pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要把它误解为需要卯尽全力或施加压力的苦差事.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... construe 解释，翻译 misconstrue 误解，曲解 ensue 随起，续起.

Light Me Up全碟歌词中英文对照... ... I’m misused,misconstrued 我被利用,被误解 I don’t need to be saved 我不需要等待救赎.

list.abs: He deliberately misconstrued everything I said., 他故意曲解我所说的一切.
the relationship between natural disasters and communicable diseases is frequently misconstrued .人们常常误解自然灾害与传播性疾病之间的关系。
he noted that this was a point which , in recent years , had frequently been denied or misconstrued .他指出，这是这一点，在最近几年里，经常被拒绝或误解。
Good intentions may misconstrued and , of course , dissent can also be hijacked., 善意可以被曲解 , 异议当然可以被骑劫.

entry.def: If you misconstrue something that has been said or something that happens, you interpret it wrongly.

example.ex: An outsider might misconstrue the nature of the relationship...
example.tran: 外人也许会误解这种关系的本质。

auth_sentence.content: Even today, it is easy to misconstrue his message.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even today, it is easy to misconstrue his message.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even today, it is easy to misconstrue his message.

auth_sentence.content: How in the hell did you misconstrue what I said as it created a vacuum sucking in air and moisture?
auth_sentence.res_content: How in the hell did you misconstrue what I said as it created a vacuum sucking in air and moisture?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How in the hell did you misconstrue what I said as it created a vacuum sucking in air and moisture?

auth_sentence.content: " He added: "I hope people don't misconstrue our lap of honour.
